Title: ↩️ Ukrainian Armed Forces losses, repelling attacks and prisoners...
Description: TASS: The Russian Armed Forces repelled two attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine within 24 hours in the Kursk region, the Russian Ministry of Defense said. The total losses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces during the fighting in the Kursk direction amounted to more than 21,550 military personnel and 139 tanks. noted in the department. Losses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, repelling attacks and prisoners. The situation in the Kursk region:▪The enemy lost more than 200 people, three tanks, an armored fighting vehicle in one day;▪Five servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine surrendered;▪The total losses of the Armed Forces of Ukraine during the fighting in the Kursk direction amounted to more than 21,550 military personnel;▪Russian military for 24 hours repelled two enemy attacks in the area of ​​Lyubimovka and Kamyshevka; ▪The 'North' group continued its offensive and defeated the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the areas of the settlements of Darino, Lyubimovka, Novy Put and Plekhovo;▪The Russian military hit concentrations of manpower and equipment of 13 enemy brigades in the Kursk region;▪Russian aviation hit Ukrainian reserves in the Sumy region ;▪The Ukrainian Armed Forces are holding civilians who remained in the occupied territories in a boarding school in the city of Sudzhi, Kursk region, the head of the Sudzhansky district told TASS.

Title: ↩️ What is known about the consequences of the UAV attack in Adyg...
Description: TASS: About 30-40 people were evacuated after a night UAV attack in Adygea, the press service of the head of the region told TASS. People will be able to return to their homes immediately after the completion of the work of the special services;▪Those who are in the temporary accommodation center were examined by doctors, three pensioners were placed in the geriatric department of the hospital;▪Security measures have been strengthened in the capital of Adygea, the situation is under the control of relevant departments. All life support facilities are functioning as normal, Mitrofanov said; ▪The head of the Maykop administration explained that false information about the introduction of a special situation in Maykop and the mass evacuation of the population is being disseminated in various chats and channels.

The Ministry of Digital Development of the Russian Federation and Roskomnadzor have prepared rules for maintaining channels in social networks with an audience of more than 10 thousand people:▪After verification, channels will be included by Roskomnadzor in the list of public pages with an audience of more than 10 thousand users;▪Channel owners must independently provide a minimum amount of basic information about themselves and the channel either through the 'State Services' portal, or through the Roskomnadzor website or using a chatbot on a social network;▪When a public is included in the list, Roskomnadzor will notify its owner and the owner of the social network;▪The social network must place a special sign and a unique link on the page , by which you can check whether the public is really on the list;▪Channels verified in this way will be able to place advertisements and accept donations;▪New mechanisms will help protect public owners from duplicate accounts, attackers will not be able to steal the page of a verified author, citizens will not get involved in fraudulent schemes and send money to dubious channels.

Title: ↩️🖼 What is known about the new plenipotentiary representative o...
Description: TASS: Putin appointed Artem Zhoga as presidential plenipotentiary envoy to the Ural Federal District, according to the Kremlin’s Telegram channel. What is known about the new plenipotentiary representative of the President of the Russian Federation in the Ural Federal District Artem Zhoga.▪️Born on January 18, 1975 in the village of Shirokiy, Susumansky district of the Magadan region. Since the 1990s, he lived in Ukraine in the city of Slavyansk, Donetsk region.▪️In the 1990s, he was engaged in business.▪️In 2014, he joined the Donbass people’s militia. He served in the 'Sparta' battalion, a unit of the DPR people's militia, commanded by Arsen Pavlov (call sign Motorola).▪️In 2016, the unit was headed by Artem Zhoga's son, Vladimir. Artem Zhoga himself took the position of chief of staff.▪️After the death of his son in March 2022, he became commander of the Sparta battalion.▪️On September 10, 2023, he was elected as a deputy of the republican parliament from the United Russia party. On September 20, 2023, he was elected chairman of the People's Council of the DPR.▪️On December 8, 2023, at the Golden Star medal ceremony, Zhoga addressed Putin, asking him to take part in the presidential elections in 2024. ▪️Awarded the Order of Courage.

Title: ↩️ What is known about the situation in the Kursk region: ▪The Ru...
Description: TASS: The main statement from the Russian Ministry of Defense on the situation in the Kursk direction: ▪️In total, during the fighting in the Kursk region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine lost more than 17,750 military personnel, 131 tanks; ▪️The Russian Armed Forces repelled 11 attempts by the Ukrainian Armed Forces to break through the Russian border near the settlements of Novy Put... What is known about the situation in the Kursk region:▪Russian military repelled five enemy counterattacks in the direction of Lyubimovka and Plekhovo per day;▪Repelled 11 attempts by the Ukrainian Armed Forces to break through the border near populated areas points of New Put and Medvezhye;▪Units of the North group of troops continued to conduct offensive operations and defeated Ukrainian formations in the areas of the settlements of Lyubimovka, Darino, New Put, Nikolaevo-Daryino and Plekhovo;▪In total, during the hostilities, Kyiv lost more than 17,750 military personnel;▪Part of the foreign mercenaries who were in the ranks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Kursk region have already been destroyed; they were a legitimate target. One should not be surprised that among them there are mercenaries from friendly countries, Alaudinov told TASS;▪The FSB opened criminal cases for illegally crossing the state border in the Kursk region by three journalists, citizens of the United States and Romania. We are talking about the correspondents of the Australian TV channel ABC Fletcher Young and Catherine Diess, as well as the journalist of the Romanian news site НotNews Parbu Mircea;▪Explosive technicians neutralized almost 600 explosive objects in the region. Work is also being carried out in settlements liberated from the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The person executed was Alan Eugene Miller, who was convicted of killing three people in 1999.
